summary: After a fundraiser for a black politician is robbed, Detroit police put two detectives, one white and one black, on the case, who try to work together under boiling political pressure.

keywords: street shootout|suitcase full of money|cruise ship|shot multiple times|cemetery
title: Detroit 9000
